Urn weight: Pitman–Yor process

Source: R/utils.R
urn_PY.Rd

Urn weight: Pitman–Yor process

Usage

urn_PY(v_minus, alpha_PY, sigma_PY)

Arguments

v_minus

integer sizes of occupied clusters (excluding focal item).

alpha_PY

numeric concentration (> -sigma_PY).

sigma_PY

numeric discount in [0,1).

Value

Numeric vector length \(K+1\). #' @references Legramanti, S., Rigon, T., Durante, D., Dunson, D.B., 2022. Extended stochastic block models with application to criminal networks. The Annals of Applied Statistics 16. https://doi.org/10.1214/21-aoas1595
